_source.text: Adults doing the footwork for their young relatives is a lot better than grousing about the titles that "should be" age-appropriate.

_source.text: Actually, from someone like me who used to teach netball(!) it is better than basketball as a means of teaching spatial awareness, footwork and go forward.
